Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Please follow me. Someone is waiting for you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With an inviting gesture, Haicma steps aside to lead the way.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "She is both the core of Discovery and its guardian, which is why she's able to peer further into the future.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Or rather... she is no longer part of this universe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No longer belongs to this universe...', 3: '10', 4: 'What does that mean?', 5: '10'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Sage will bring you up to speed on that.', 4: '1'}
